mapper.select: SELECT a.device_id , d.device_serial , a.sys_location , a.sys_contact , a.model_seq , m.model_nm , a.sys_hw_version , a.sys_hw_build , a.sys_sw_version , a.sys_sw_revision , a.sys_port , a.ntw_type , a.ntw_app_name , a.ntw_state , a.ntw_gateway , a.ntw_eth_ip , a.ntw_eth_subnet_mask , a.ntw_eth_phy , a.ntw_ppp_ip , a.ntw_ppp_subnet_mask , a.mobile_no , DATE_FORMAT(a.reg_dt,'${prop.dt.plain}') as reg_dt , DATE_FORMAT(a.update_dt,'${prop.dt.plain}') as update_dt FROM GND_GW_INFO a INNER JOIN GND_DEVICE_INFO d ON (a.device_id = comm.device_id) LEFT OUTER JOIN GND_DEVICE_MODEL m ON (a.model_seq = m.model_seq)
SELECT count(*) as co FROM GND_GW_INFO a LEFT OUTER JOIN GND_DEVICE_INFO d ON (a.device_id = comm.device_id)

SELECT a.device_id , d.device_serial , a.sys_location , a.sys_contact , a.model_seq , m.model_nm , a.sys_hw_version , a.sys_hw_build , a.sys_sw_version , a.sys_sw_revision , a.sys_port , a.ntw_type , a.ntw_app_name , a.ntw_state , a.ntw_gateway , a.ntw_eth_ip , a.ntw_eth_subnet_mask , a.ntw_eth_phy , a.ntw_ppp_ip , a.ntw_ppp_subnet_mask , a.mobile_no , DATE_FORMAT(a.reg_dt,'${prop.dt.plain}') as reg_dt , DATE_FORMAT(a.update_dt,'${prop.dt.plain}') as update_dt FROM GND_GW_INFO a INNER JOIN GND_DEVICE_INFO d ON (a.device_id = comm.device_id) LEFT OUTER JOIN GND_DEVICE_MODEL m ON (a.model_seq = m.model_seq) WHERE a.device_id = #{deviceId}
